trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioStateChanged" name="AudioStateChanged" href=""></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioStateChanged" name="AudioStateChanged" href=""></xref>事件<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref>或<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property gets a new instance of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration when a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> or a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>屬性取得的新執行個體<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>列舉型別時<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the current state of the audio input using the `AudioState` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得目前的狀態，輸入使用的音訊`AudioState`屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>類別。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the new state of audio input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 取得辨識器的音訊輸入的新狀態。

trans-unit.source: The AudioState property contains one of three values from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: AudioState 屬性包含三個值之一從<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>列舉型別。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: The state of audio input after a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 音訊輸入之後的狀態<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged"></xref>或<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged"></xref>就會引發事件。
